title: Crush on You
description: She made knitting sexy. Now she's taking on a dilapidated winery, three sisters, and the bad boys next door.  The Baci sisters are on a mission to save the winery that's been in their family for generations-by transforming it into the perfect wedding destination. If only Alessandra Baci-affectionately known as the "Nun of Napa"-didn't need the help of tempting neighbor and business rival Penn Bennett.
author: Christie Ridgway
